About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am an experienced and creative full-stack software engineer that is eager to work on game changing products with interesting technical challenges. I have built complex web apps, designed algorithms, built a deep neural network using TensorFlow and can pick up new languages and frameworks in a short period of time. I have experience with TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Ruby, Node.js, Express.js, TensorFlow.js, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Git, GitHub, React, Angular, Ionic, Ruby on Rails, SQL, NoSQL, Database Modeling, Web API Integration, Postgres, Firebase, and NPM.

Fun Fact

My first invention

I filed for a patent at the age of 17 for the invention of a slot loading optical disc case.

GoPulse

Social News Platform

GoPulse is a social news platform designed to help subscribers make sense of the world with an intelligent community of free thinkers. Try it out and leave me some feedback => tom@gopule.app

Hyper_Rank

Collaborative Filtering Algorithm

Hyper Rank is user-user collaborative filtering algorithm that I have implemented here in Python. I designed it to be extremeley robust even with small datasets, so it works great for apps with a small number of users and items to be ranked. Hyper Rank served as an intellectual exercise for me to learn algorithm design and mathematical notaion it is not really intented to be used in production applications with large amounts of data.
